pullRequest.title: EQL: Hook engine to Elasticsearch
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add query execution and return actual results returned from
Elasticsearch inside the tests

commit.message:
EQL: Hook engine to Elasticsearch

Add query execution and return actual results returned from
Elasticsearch inside the tests

nodes.bodyText: nit: can remove the comment above

Github wont' let me comment on the snippet above, but it should be updated to something like:
[source,console]
----
GET sec_logs/_eql/search
{
 "event_type_field": "event.category",
 "rule": """
    process where process.name == "cmd.exe"
  """
}
----

I would leave event.category as the event_type_field as it conforms to ECS.
I would leave this as-is and just update the EQL search snippet below.
Is time the amount of time it took to return the results (judging by the execTime() method) ? If so, wouldn't be more descriptive to have this named took or duration or execTime?
